string.text: Total amount to overdraw for "non grata" (price)
string.description: Won amount from bets to reach a ban on the arena
When "non grata" status will be removed. Set this or price limit as zero if you want to switch off

How fast you could pass a price limit threshold to be banned from bets. Reducing this factor causing price limit refresh faster. Recommend to keep this value as default, only if you want to experiment.

string.text: Base start coeff to degradate of given equipment (%)
string.description: This is a a multiplier for the arena armor and weapon. So if you armor has 100%, in case of degradation coefficient with 0.5, your armor will be 50% durability.
This is a range to give a randomness from degradation coefficient. So in case of 50% armor degradation and this value of 10% (0.1), range for random will be 45-55%
